item.description:
Come hang out with other liberty-lovers in the northern Seacoast region. The location has changed. New location - Pizza Hut Italian Bistro, 302 N Main St, Rochester, conveniently located between Spaulding Turnpike exits 14, Ten Rod Rd, and 15, N Main St / Rte 11 (to Farmington). On the east side of Main St, directly across from the tiny Main St mall where the Planet Fitness gym is located, the restaurant shares a driveway with the Dunkin' Donuts. I haven't told the restaurant we're coming but they generally seem to have plenty of room, just tell the person seating you you're with a small group, Seacoast Liberty (at this point I would tell them we might get 5 people, though I hope to make this event larger over time). There are two rooms so I have no idea which one they'll put us in. This place is a lot more comfortable and conversation-friendly than the old location, where we had to raise our voices to be heard over the music. This will be a monthly event, repeating every month, on the second Saturday of the month at 6 pm. It is to this point the only weekend meetup for Seacoast Liberty, so I would like to encourage people from other areas to attend. I made it only once a month because it is a bit out of the way for many people, I would also love to have friends come over from the Lakes region, and from Maine, it is only about 30 minutes from Sanford to Rochester.

 

I want this event to become something where we discuss our plans and ideas for activism and not just hang out, though that can be fun as well.
item.name: Meetup in Rochester, at Pizza Hut Bistro
